name: random-movie-mashup-homework
description: This is a web app that uses Randomuser and Movies API along with ejs, express, mongodb, mongoose, and most importantly passportjs to register/login users into a website while saving their sessions and cookies and login data and displaying two options for Random User API results and Now Playing Movies from Movies API, data is generated dynamically
author: Bogdan Kowaltchook Pliable.Link
